column1: # Data on the influence of the shielding of polyethylene on the final scoring of DPA in quartz. The displacement energy used is E_th = 41.8 eV
# The number of primaries for the simulation are 200000
# This results in a displacement energy of  E_th = (41.8 ± 1.3)eV => 40.5 eV < E_th < 43.1 eV with 68% of probability in this model.
